author: NB
reviewTitle: Best Volunteer Run Bachata Event in London!
reviewBody: BE is an amazing community with great bachata teachers who volunteer their time to bring together an incluaive bachata experience in London.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Arya Z
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange is the social dancing capital of the Bachata community. People from around England come together in this place and you'll find all the best national and international artists here. It's a magnificent arena for a magical dance. People come here and discover bachata and fall in love with the dance. We need this place to go forever.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Discover760916
reviewBody: Best bachata social in London! A great atmosphere with lots of nice dancers. One of the best ways to end the week, and brings a lot of happiness to lots of people who attend.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Petya Nova
reviewTitle: Bachata Exchange - The dance community builder London adores!
reviewBody: The best part of Bachata Exchange is the sense of community. Dancers of all ages and skill levels come together in an inclusive, welcoming environment. Workshops for beginners make it easy for newcomers to join the fun, while experienced dancers offer tips and encouragement in the other level donation classes. It's a fantastic cultural celebration, a community builder, and a great way to stay active. This event brings people together through the joy of dance, creating connections and memories every week.In short, the Bachata Exchange is a weekly Sunday highlight that enriches lives!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Charlie P
reviewTitle: THE dance event for visitors and locals
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange was the first place in London I danced when I came back to visit family during a stint living in the US - I only knew about it from American friends who’d found it so phenomenally welcoming, fun and energising during their visits to London. What. An. Event. After moving to London full time, I started teaching at BE around once a month. Seeing how much joy people experienced from an amazing combination of a beautiful venue, a giving community, total acceptance of skill/level from others and connecting with new people creates such an ease drive for us as teachers (and as social dancers!) at BE. The venue is unparalleled in London. We don’t get much sun here in the UK, so an open spot that gives us all the light we can get, is breathable, spacious and beautiful is clearly one of the reasons people travel from (literally) other cities every week to make it to BE. The community is amazing, people feel safe and respected. The music is 👌. The location is glorious. It’s a staple for people’s social, mental and physical well-being. We (friends from abroad, friends from the UK, the dance community in London and I) absolutely love BE.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Trip16330740088
reviewTitle: BE - Best bachata event in London!!!!
reviewBody: The best way to learn bachata in a free, funny and diverse environment. Everyone makes you feel so welcome and it's amazing to see generations coming together to learn how to dance and share their own skills. I've been a few times and was the best place to do it! Everyone should try. Can't way to go back!!!!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Maddy L
reviewBody: The best regular dance event I have ever been to, anywhere in the world. Friendly, fun and safe place to enjoy dancing with a warm community. It’s incomparable!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Mihaela P
reviewBody: Amazing dancing experience, I have been attending Bachata Exchange on several occasions , even more I was travelling every time from Birmingham down to London because it’s 100 % worth it ! Vibrant atmosphere, infectious energy , great music and amazing dancers - perfect mix for an unforgettable evening. Free entry which makes it supper accessible for everyone considering there are classes given prior to the social dancing . Enthusiastic and welcoming instructors - making it easy for both beginners and experienced dancers to join and have fun ! It’s a perfect way to unwind, meet new people and explore the world of Bachata !
name: Bachata Exchange

author: tareknet89
reviewBody: I can't praise Bachata Exchange (BE) enough! This fantastic place has become a cornerstone of my weekly routine and a vibrant part of the Broadgate community. BE is not just about dancing; it's about building connections, staying active, and supporting local businesses.Every time I attend BE, I make a point of visiting the local restaurants and shops. The influx of BE members brings a noticeable boost to the local economy, making it a win-win for everyone involved. Before heading to BE, I often use the nearby gym, which helps me stay fit and energized for the night of dancing ahead.BE has had a profoundly positive impact on my life. The welcoming atmosphere and the joy of dancing have significantly improved my overall happiness and well-being. This has translated directly into my work life, making me a more engaged and productive employee. The physical activity keeps me healthy, and the social interaction boosts my mood, making me look forward to each day with renewed enthusiasm.Thank you, Bachata Exchange, for being such a wonderful part of my life and for contributing so much to the Broadgate community!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Julia F
reviewTitle: Everyone should have access to learning to dance
reviewBody: I traveled from Birmingham with some friends to go to bachata exchange. I can't express how badly we need community projects and spaces like these and how important it is for them to carry on.Dance is joyful, it's real human connection, it's self expression, it fills your whole body with endorphins and feeds your soul. Being a free event it's accessible to everyone and you will find all different types of people coming together to share it. With so many people struggling financially, with stress, loneliness, mental health; I'm so grateful for people organizing events like this out of pure passion.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: RuxandraZavoianu
reviewBody: The best place in London to dance bachata, improve musicality, technique and style plus meet great dancers from all over the world and be part of a friendly community. Amazing energy and I am so grateful for being part of it!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Chiara G
reviewBody: Bachata exchange is an incredible community project. It provides an invaluable place to dance, learn to dance and meet new people. Very special place!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Mohammed Sharif U
reviewTitle: Best place for Bachata in London UK
reviewBody: The best place in London UK to practice and learn Bachata and it helps a lot to keep united the Bachata Community and to Socialise with people in the weekend. We hope that Bachata Exchange London will continue in the future.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: David A
reviewBody: BE is the best bachata venue in London, especially in the summer. The lessons are pretty good but the social dancing afterwards is excellent.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Mark A
reviewBody: Couldn't recommend more and doesn't matter what your level of Bachata is, it's great fun even if you're starting out
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Sarah T
reviewTitle: Bachata Exchange is the BEST free dance event in London.
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange is the BEST free dance event in London.I discovered it via tik tok in November 2022 and have been going basically ever since.I went on my own because I wanted to try something new and had never danced bachata. I was really nervous going into it, but I didn’t need to be. You don’t need to go with a partner, which makes it even better! Everyone was so welcoming & friendly. The teachers explained everything so thoroughly. And from that moment I was hooked.After the class when the social dancing started, it looked really intimidating & I was about to leave when one of the advanced dancers asked me to dance. I explained I was a beginner and it was my first class but he didn’t mind and encouraged me. (Shout out to Mark who I’m still friends with & still dance bachata with!).Because of that I ended up staying and dancing for hours & started dancing bachata a few times a week.But I always return to bachata exchange as it’s such a relaxed and fun environment and an unrivalled community. London needs more communities like Bachata Exchange!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Gediminas Jurgi... P
reviewBody: Best Bachata party in town. It happens on Sundays and is hosted in a large open space near Liverpool Street. Always great music and great dancers.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: francesco m
reviewBody: Amazing dance experience, great music and atmosphere. The environment is very friendly and multicultural and also safe
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Lyn D
reviewBody: Seriously, the best way to meet new people and getting out of your comfort zone! BE made me feel so welcome 🙏🏼 I don’t know what I would do without BE
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Catchata
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange is a beautiful dance community and is certainly the place to BE! It is a fun, safe and inclusive space for dancing and socialising. It’s very convenient for travel and the surrounding areas have great amenities so great to have lunch or dinner before attending BE and the local coffee shops keep me caffeinated for an evening of dancing. This event has made such a difference to my life. It’s not only great physical activity but a great way to be sociable and destress from a busy work week. It’s been amazing for my mental health and well being and has helped me to make new friendships and meet people from all over the world from many different walks of life. It’s also kept me dancing when times were financially challenging. Such an amazing community has been created here.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Carmen Sita
reviewBody: Travelling to London from Brighton mainly to attend this event has come to be the highlight of the week for most of us brightonians. The joy we feel dancing with others and the friendships we make is something that we can't imagine being without. Such an awesome group of people and a great atmosphere each and every time. Definitely never disappoints ❤️
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Barry N
reviewBody: A fantastic event! Free classes at different levels with great teachers. At present the classes are not available and I'm really missing them. A great place to learn something new and meet friendly fun loving people! Bring it back!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Man O
reviewBody: Nice dancers and wonderful environment for social. Only been there a couple of times when I visited London but really enjoyed it, and would recommend it to anyone dancing or interested in bachata!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Sarah V
reviewBody: Amazing all bachata dance event with great classes followed by incredible social. Such a fun vibe!! Long may it continue!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Jaz_Kaur91
reviewBody: This biggest and best Bachata social in London hands down. I came across this by chance last year and now its an integral part of my life. Thank you to the organizers for keeping this a safe space for people to learn and make friends within the community.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Rishabh S
reviewBody: The best bachata social and classes in London. I have not found any paid socials in London to be of the quality of this free one.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: A J
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange is a great example of what London community life should be like. I've been going for two years now and from the start it's been such a welcoming space, a place you can spend the evening getting exercise, learning an incredible new skill, and making friends, without it being about alcohol! The people are friendly and considerate, the volunteers are dedicated and always keep the space clean. There are some great restaurants and coffee shops in the area so you can grab a bite to eat first and Liverpool Street Station is right there so it's easy to get home. London needs more spaces like Bachata Exchange!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Mamun R
reviewBody: What a great initiative this is. Such great energy from so many great people, you can see the happiness it brings to so many throughout the year, myself included. It makes Sundays the days I look forward to most. What a great effort an amazing team puts in behind this.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: murdershewrote
reviewBody: Escape the Sunday scaries and discover your happy place at the weekly Bachata event! This isn't just about dance lessons (huge thanks to the incredible volunteers who lead them for small donations!). It's a community unlike any other, a vibrant haven under a covered outdoor space. Here, hearts connect and worries fade as you share smiles and stories with fellow Bachata enthusiasts. Whether you're a complete beginner or a seasoned dancer, the welcoming atmosphere makes you feel instantly at home.But the true magic unfolds during the social dancing. The music ignites a spark, the energy crackles, and suddenly you're surrounded by a family of kindred spirits. Sharing laughter and steps with like-minded people goes beyond the physical benefits of dance. It's a balm for the soul, a chance to de-stress, connect, and rediscover the joy of human connection.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Vikrant
reviewBody: Amazing place to dance bachata, meet friends , make new friends , unwind, relax ...Very friendly community, Volunteers have done such a great job to build this lovely community over last few years ... it will be a shame to loose this little gem in Central London , we all hope BE can start back soon...Thanks Vikrant
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Fabian D
reviewBody: Amazing place to dance bachata in London! Ever since I went the first time I look forward to going on Sundays. It has a very friendly and energetic vibe and hope it comes back.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Irina K
reviewTitle: Best place in London for latin dancing
reviewBody: This is the best place in London for latin dancing. It is not only a place to learn bachata but it is more of a community where everyone can learn, dance, socialize and make friends. I have been going to Bachata Exchange for 2 years and it has been a highlight in my life. I hope Bachata Exchange keeps running for many more years.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Cristina R
reviewBody: Bachata exchange has been for the past few years a place of warmth, social connection and beautiful dancing. I honestly wouldn’t have coped through the covid period without it! Bachata exchange got me the opportunity to meet so many amazing people who I know call friends! The connections I made have made through this amazing place are indescribable, and we all have to thank the few members of the group who endlessly organise teachers’s classes, make the flyers, dj and bring the music equipment! On top of this the classes are upon donations and therefore accessible to a wide range of dancers. I hope bachata exchange will continue to run for a very long time!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Leelawadee C
reviewBody: This bachata is amazing. The vibe, people and classes are wonderful. I am looking forward to dancing there again. Please bring it back!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Amber W
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange has been part of my dance journey since the beginning (2.5 years ago).It's a wonderful community initiative that exists both here in London and also in Spain. It attracts everyone from professional dancers to those with two left feet offering free classes for everyone on a weekly basis and then a 5 hour social to consolidate what's been learnt.Exchange is extremely welcoming, a safe and alcohol-free environment for all ages, pregnant women, all sexualities, gender expressions and culture can all dance together free of judgment in a low pressure environment in a prime location.It's my weekly highlight and its growth over the years is a testament to the joy it brings to peoples lives :)Don't take it away <3
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Jasper L
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange lights up my week. Such a wonderful initiative run by big hearts and bigger smiles, a place where strangers (and friends) from all over the world can connect and share magical moments through the love of DANCE. Truly, Bachata Exchange has enriched my life. Fantastic, sober fun in a small pocket of central London that nourishes the soul of everyone who attends and stumbles across it.In a turbulent world, it can be tempting to lose faith in humanity.BE restores it.Thank you x
name: Bachata Exchange

author: austin d
reviewBody: People who love dancing Bachata having a great time. Very friendly people and a great atmosphere. It is really sad that this amazing place is struggling to keep the venue at Exchange Square
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Nikhita A
reviewTitle: BE is the place to be!
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange is where I got introduced to Bachata for the very first time back in September 2023! I can’t begin to express how much that place means to me and hundreds of others because of how welcoming it is to dancers and non-dancers. It’s a place filled with passionate people and a place to go to for respite on weekends if you just want to get away from everyday life haha. Absolutely miss the classes and socials and really hope it will be back up and running soon <3
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Bryan B
reviewBody: It's an amazing community that brings people together from all different backgrounds. They are like a big friendly, lovely, peaceful family . It's such a shame that they are trying to stop this free event.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: John P
reviewTitle: Best place to social dance Bachata in London
reviewBody: Great place to dance Bachata outdoors in good weather! Also contributes massively to the dance community in London! Would pay for it without hesitation if they charged entry.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Iosune M
reviewBody: I’ve been attending BE for a year now and it’s been one of my biggest discoveries! I love the area -Liverpool Street is close to work and I normally work on weekends. It is very lively, feels safe, and you have nice food options around the area. Exchange Square is a great vibe for this outdoor event, it is lovely during the summer both to dance or just chat with a friend.The community in BE is so respectful, people from all ways of life come to learn, have fun and move their bodies! I like that it never becomes a party, people simply connect by their passion for bachata. Attending BE is a great ending to my weeks - a great initiative to promote physical activity and social interaction, regardless of your financial capabilities, where you come from or your dance expertise!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Mohammad H
reviewTitle: Bachata exchange is the hallmark of elegance and excellence
reviewBody: It was an amazing experience. There are so many wonderful and golden memories since it started. I had moments in exchange for that I want to live thousand years and love it from the bottom of my heart, needless to say, this deep feelings will continue until I stop breathing.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: M L
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange is probably the best bachata event in London. In fact I would say it's one of the best events I have ever been to in London in general, across all kinds and categories. And this is even without considering the fact that it's free. The classes are top level and the vibe at the social is amazing. I have no doubt that BE has a very significant positive impact on the wellbeing of many people and on fostering social connection and communities.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Scott P
reviewBody: The best place to dance in London . Lovely outside environment, good security staff and friendly crowd .Lots of good music and dancers
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Sarah-Beth V
reviewBody: Ever since I stumbled across this place in October, it has been a highlight of my week, a mood lift, some exercise and a great community spirit. I didn't know such cool outdoor dance events happened in the UK and was super happy to discover it after dancing at similar place in Colombia. BE brings people from across London (and beyond) together with one passion. Long may it live on!!!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: laura s
reviewBody: Amazing place to pass time with Very helpful for all the people that want to dance and the lack of money doesn't allow them.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Rosne M
reviewTitle: Bachata Social Event on Sunday Evenings in London!
reviewBody: Bachata Social Event which started just after the Lockdowns is a good Social dancing event where we meet to dance Bachata and socialise , meet friends and new people too. It's free event which is good for those who can't afford expensive dance socials in London venues or clubs. Strictly no alcohol policy on premises!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Kyra
reviewBody: I value BE a lot. It is so important to have an event/venue that is suitable for all types of people. I have danced for some time and when I first started it was the first place people told me to go and they were very correct. It enabled me meet dancers from across the whole city as it is a place where the whole community connects.When I was pregnant last year it was very difficult for me to continue dancing. BE enabled me to do so as it was outside with space and London venues were far too hot and crowded for a pregnant woman. It enabled me to stay healthy and happy and use dance to cure lots of pregnancy symptoms. I now have a son and it is has once again enabled me to keep dancing. Due to BE taking place earlier in the day than typical events it enabled me hours of dancing and to be back in time for night time feeds and also still be able the hours of sleep you need as a parent of a baby. There are very few places where you can do this.BE has enabled more diversity in the community as it enables people from all stages and walks of life to be able to get together. I am sure there are others in others who attend BE as it offers a unique environment and community which you cannot access elsewhere. I will also be moving out of London soon and unable to attend typical classes and events as easy. As BE is on a Sunday it will enable me to drive in without paying congestion charge and also continue dancing as a parent.Over the past few years BE has been one of the main things I look forward to coming in the summer months and I will be very very sad if it did not come back.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Wayne R
reviewBody: Great event. So rare to find such a positive free event in London.You could even use both halls it’s soo good. Hope to come again soon!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Zuzana K
reviewBody: I last visited Bachata Exchange in October and really loved it. Such a great space for dancers to get together. It’s probably my favourite dance community in London and I love that it’s outside and the location is great for my commute into London from Hertfordshire. BE is different because it focuses only on bachata and the clases are in Sundays, it can be hard to find clases to attend on weekends which are also accessible to all as BE doesn’t charge for classes but relies on fundraising. I was planning to go this weekend and saw that BE is cancelled and I’m so gutted. I really hope the events continue!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Samuel L
reviewBody: With outstanding instructors and a fantastic community, this is not only my favorite dance spot in London but also my top pick in the city overall. Whether you're a beginner just starting out or someone with months or even years of experience, this is the ultimate place to dance!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: hana B
reviewBody: Such an amazing social and great classes, really friendly vibes, it was my first experience of bachata and I couldn’t recommend it enough!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: screename08
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange is the only place in London that makes dancing fully accessible to everyone. You don’t need to pay for the classes or the social and you get to learn new moves as well as practice for free. Some people travel from other parts of the UK just to come here and teach as well as dance. The best part about being here is that you can even dance outside irrespective of the weather thanks to the roofed terrace and there is always enough space to dance regardless of how many people there are.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Katherine W
reviewTitle: The place to be for Bachata!
reviewBody: I absolutely love Bachata Exchange! It’s been such an amazing place to dance, meet friends and just have the best time. The location is perfect for us being right by London Liverpool Street station which makes it so accessible! We would visit London from Norwich on a Sunday specifically for this event. Everyone has been so friendly and it’s incredible everyone comes from all over just for this. I would highly recommend this to anyone wanting to dance Bachata - it caters for all levels ☺️
name: Bachata Exchange

author: James H
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange is THE No.1 bachata community in London. The teachers are so wonderful, everyone is so friendly and the social after the classes is brilliant. The environment is so professional and welcoming. I’d recommend anyone to go, whether you have never danced bachata before and want to have your first experience or if you are an improver and want to consolidate your skills. They even have a live DJ and sound system. It is such an excellent place for people who love to dance to meet, make friends and have a great time. It is such a safe place to learn and have fun with like minded people.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: ruby h
reviewTitle: The place to be for bachata social dancing
reviewBody: Everyone who dances bachata in London knows about Bachata Exchange. It’s one of the best, if not the best, places to dance plus there’s FREE classes every week - honestly, it really doesn’t get better. You have such a range of levels from complete beginners to experienced dancers. There’s a huge community and it always feels safe with good vibes and respectful etiquette. I will always go whenever I can, despite it being a 2+ hour round trip, it’s just that good!! Plus, most people turn up on their own and make/meet friends there, so if you’re new to dancing or to BE, know you’ll be warmly welcomed ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Alex
reviewTitle: BEat the Sunday Scaries dancing Bachata at the BEst event in London!
reviewBody: Can’t recommend enough, this is the BEst dancing event in London! The classes cater to all levels, from never-danced-before to advanced bachaters, hosted by a wonderful team of enthusiastic teachers. Then you can put it all to practice during the social dance, which has the BEst atmosphere and loveliest community; if you’ve never danced before, no fret, you will quickly find your bachata feet and never look back! Highly, highly recommend — I can never wait for Sunday to come around, it is so much fun! We hope to see you back soon, because Sunday’s are just not the same without BE!!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Lauren spears
reviewBody: Amazing environment!!! If you’re looking to dance bachata in London it’s the place to BE. A nice place to dance but also to socialise and catch up with friends!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Neil-Taylor99
reviewBody: Fantastic venue for Sunday evening Bachata. Outside venue although covered from the elements. Situated just behind Liverpool Street Station. Like minded people dancing in a safe environment. Highly recommended.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Silvia P
reviewBody: Best place to dance in London! Not only you get a free class and social, but the teachers are amazing and this event attracts a lot of great dancers. Great atmosphere and dancing experience, highly recommend.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: mbhramar
reviewTitle: Amazing community and best bachata event in London
reviewBody: This is one of the most amazing dance platforms, event and community that exists in London.It brings a sense of belonging and joy
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Ludmila C
reviewBody: Bachata exchange is a great event for beginners and advanced dancers, plus it is outdoors and not late in the evening making it inclusive for anyone. I look forward to it each Sunday. Great place to learn new skills with motivated and talented teachers and a super community for dancers.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Rosie K
reviewBody: I love bachata exchange. It's one of the friendliest places to dance in london. The site is wonderful as it encourages people to be more relaxed as there's plenty of space
name: Bachata Exchange

author: cro44
reviewBody: This event is amazing! People are so friendly and BE genuinely brings lots of joy to many people bringing them together in their passion for dancing.It is genuinely a platform to improve well being in a city that can be stressful.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Dariusz Ł
reviewBody: Absolutely amazing event for all levels of dancers! You can just pop in and with an hour get basic Bachata moves. Great international vibe, friendly atmosphere. Absolutely recommend!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Suzy Cue
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange is the highlight of my week. It is a place for the bachata dance community in London to connect and grow. It’s not just a dance event…it’s a community event. In a big city like London, these kinds of spaces are incredibly rare. It has brought me an insane amount of fun and joy over the past few years. We are incredibly blessed to have had this event in our lives, and it’s absolutely unbelievable that it’s free, fuelled by sheer and pure love of dance. A million thanks to everyone who has made this event possible, the community and for the company that owns the space, thank you for contributing to society with this vibrant and welcoming place. I can’t wait to go again!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: avi
reviewTitle: A wonderful place to learn and dance Batchata for free
reviewBody: Batchata exchange allows a wide variety of dancers from a wide variety of age and social background to learn and dance batchata for free. Dancing there has immense positive influence on their well being, mental health , physical health and happiness. Batchata has magnificent positive energy, allowing people to connect smile, express their creativity and share their common passion for dancing. Batchata exchange drew people from London and outside London as it is hard to find parties with so many capable dancers in the city or anywhere else in the UK. Liverpool Street station is a convenient place for many dancers to commute and its central location and proximity to the station made it so popular and contributes to its social success.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Andrei S
reviewTitle: My favorite social dance event in London
reviewBody: I moved to London only very recently but it is already hard to imagine my Sundays without BE. The community is fantastic, instructors are outstanding, and the event is completely free. I would recommend anyone to go, both newcomers and more experienced dancers are very welcomed here
name: Bachata Exchange

author: M V
reviewTitle: Familiar and Amazing experience away from home!
reviewBody: The Sunday socials by Bachata exchange are superb! The effort put in ny organization, the warm and openness of the people dancing was truly a memorable experience. I’m still in touch with some of the people I met that day and am looking forward to my next visits to London! Not to mention I have been recommending this to all my friends that are visiting London!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Karan B
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange is an absolutely delightful experience in London and felt like home ! Every Sunday it was my go to place to enjoy my hobby - dancing Bachata !
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Go36083399801
reviewBody: What makes London amazing? The communities that make it alive and specifically free communities that hold space for creativity, expression and fun. Bachata Exchange is just that. Whether you are an absolute beginner or experienced dancer coming here you’re guaranteed to learn something new, have fun and feel welcomed. Places like BE are needed, it’s a beautiful community.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Sarah B
reviewBody: Amazing place, shame something that brings a community together and has always been safe and crime free would be stopped. London already has enough chaos and this was always a safe community where people could just be happy. Don’t take away the joy from the people! Use this as a way to promote the safety in london
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Nati V
reviewBody: Just to say that BE is the best social dancing that we have in UK. Amazing healthy environment where you can meet people and enjoy what you really like the most, dancing! Beautiful people join for 1 thing, we need BE back, UK have a big loss without it.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Go20129019608
reviewBody: This place unites the people who love bachata, all you can see is happy people who share the same passion for dancing. BE is its people who makes our Sundays the best day of the week , the amount of time they devote and the respect they treat the space with. An absolute go to!!!!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Fearless39341656842
reviewBody: I danced for the first time ever at BE. Their free beginner classes were perfect to get me started, despite knowing nothing and slowly working my way up to being confident enough to dance in the socials section. It allowed me to experience such an amazingly different world in a sometimes lonely city-dancing with strangers. Hope it is allowed to continue. Experiences like these are what make London the wonderful place it is. Please protect it!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Ashley B
reviewBody: Bachata exchange is an absolutely MASSIVE part of who I am today, if it wasn’t for this place, this community and the welcoming spirit/energy of it all ALOT of people including me wouldn’t be dancers today.I stumbled across BE years ago when I had very little idea about all things bachata and all things “dance related” immediately I fell in love with bachata and become absolutely obsessed as a result of this community and place.Today I’m a proud dance teacher, school owner and an event organiser “the founder of a new community in west London” Absolutely none of this would’ve been a reality or possible without the existence of bachata exchange. I’m eternally grateful to the community and would be heartbroken to see such a wonderful place that brings so much joy get disconnected.Long live BE and I hope you guys can get a green light to continue and inspire more future generations just like you did for me.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Amir H
reviewBody: Quite possibly one of the best dance spaces in all of London. Very friendly and welcoming too! Great exercise as well! Thank you
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Kyra V
reviewBody: BE is the best bachata experience you'll have in London! My friend introduced me to it a year ago, and my Sundays have since become the highlight of my week. The vibe at BE is incredible - the music is always spot on, the dance floor is buzzing, and the sense of community is really heartwarming. And the fact that it’s held outdoors makes it even better – it’s the perfect setting to dance, socialise, and soak up the atmosphere ✨The BE volunteers are absolute superstars, their dedication is unmatched! They put in endless efforts to ensure each event is as special as the last (Thank you Team BE 🙏🏽)I really hope more people get to come and experience the magic of Bachata Exchange. Let’s support this amazing community and keep the good times rolling for many more magical Sundays!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Marten
reviewTitle: My favorite thing in London. Oh how I wish this bright positive influence gets to stay!
reviewBody: My absolute favorite thing in London (or the world to be honest!). Organized by a very kind welcoming community. Free Bachata classes for all levels including complete beginners (donations optional but really not in an obtrusive way that you feel very obligated). A lovely community filling the place with life every Sunday and everyone is made to feel very welcome to join in. Even some friends who don't dance themselves but live in the neighborhood were telling me how happy they are that the space gets the Bachata exchange dancers were filling the place with life and a positive energy.I am very grateful to the EXCHANGE HOUSE and the local community for having made this possible for so long and I fervently hope that Bachata Exchange can continue here to brighten up this space and make everyone so happy.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Eren G
reviewBody: London's iconic dance event. An event that all dancers coming from abroad add to their travel plans, which has been taking place seamlessly for years, one of London's most successful events. With hopes for the continued support of Land owners and the ongoing success of the event!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Silvia L
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange is definitely the place to be for Bachata enthusiasts. With its complimentary classes and expert instructors, my dance skills have seen significant improvement. The teachers' dedication and expertise shine through, making learning an absolute pleasure.But, it's not just about the teaching; it's the vibrant community that sets BE apart. I've had the privilege of meeting exceptionally talented dancers who have motivated me to bring my dancing to the next level.BE is one of the most welcoming environments I've ever been intoIt's isn't just a favorite spot; it's a hub of learning, growth, and friendship. I'm immensely grateful for the skills and connections it has brought me and I'll hardly get tired of visiting over and over again.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Alex L
reviewTitle: Fantastic place to connect with the community and perfect excuse to try central pubs, markets and restaurants
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange is the best dance social in the greater London area! It's a great excuse to come into the centre of London, visit nearby pubs, markets, restaurants to meet friends old and new and then enjoy music and dancing together until late evening.It's an incredible atmosphere - people from different parts of London and surrounding areas come weekly, from St. Albans and Sussex to Richmond and Surrey.It's also a great example of how new high rise buildings provide value to local communities and create spaces to foster connections. I've been going to Bachata Exchange for a few months and have made incredible memories and met wonderful people I wouldn't have otherwise.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Daisy W
reviewBody: BE is incredible. From the teachers, to the dancers to the atmosphere created - it is one of a kind. Every friend I have bought to BE has been stunned at how friendly, kind and welcoming the energy is. Liverpool station is my favourite place to be in London because of BE. It means I’m able to meet up with friends in Shoreditch, shop at Spitalfields and finish the day dancing at Exchange House. BE have created a truly unique community and subculture appreciated by SO many. It’s a beautiful thing to be part of it!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Em
reviewBody: This community created by passionate volunteers, generous with their time and energy is so valuable to the city of London and to the bachata community worldwide. This event has allowed for teaching and sharing of knowledge with beginners all the way up the range of experience to providing an opportunity for world-class International artists to perform and teach.On a personal level, it has allowed me to find a sense of community and make lifelong friends in the capital city of London, for this reason it holds a very special place close to my heart.I hope that this event can continue to take place and share a love of dance ❤️
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Siting Q
reviewTitle: The BEST bachata community in London
reviewBody: BE is def the No.1 Bachata event in London, amazing dancers, fantastic vibe and friendly community. I started bachata and salsa because of BE and met friends from all around the world there. It’ll be heartbreaking to see it closed…Hope BE can come back and keep bringing joy to the bachata community
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Katie B
reviewBody: I love Bachata Exchange, always a super fun evening and lovely people! Highly recommend to anyone who wants to Bachata in London.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: James H
reviewTitle: A force multiplier for the dance and local community
reviewBody: I've been going to Bachata Exchange for two years now and its an essential part of not only the dancing community, but emblematic of what makes people come to London and the Broadgate area. I've met countless new friends from different areas of the UK and abroad who visit here specifically because of the positive reputation BE has. It's professionally run, rules are clearly signposted, and the organisers always pro-actively engaging attendees to create a safe environment.You can arrive right next to the event at Liverpool Street station, and because the event's in the daytime, free and outdoors, you have the time to visit the local markets, restaurants and cafes both before and after the event. In a time of cost-of-living difficulties for many, having free events like this simply makes economic sense. If people have more time and money available because an event is free and flexible, then people are more likely to support local businesses when visiting.It also provides a big platform for networking. I've seen many teaching careers start out of volunteering or attending the event, and then going on to host more events at local venues further contributing to the community and area.BE is a force multiplier for the creativity and economics of the area, and I very much hope to see it continue for a long time.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Climber19900982749
reviewBody: I started going to BE from October last year. It's become a MUST-be place for me every Sunday, and it has literally changed my life. BE has significantly improved my mental and physical health, bringing a lot of positive impact to my daily life. The community BE created is amazing, with everyone bringing good energy and vibes together. We used to hang out before and after the events, exploring lots of nice food and drink places around the area. I really hope BE comes back soon!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Kevin N
reviewTitle: The best bachata event in London
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange is a donation based community run dance classes and social dancing event that serves the London dance community and beyond. Many commute into London from out of town just for this event, and I have brought all my international friends visiting the UK here, to showcase the beautiful vibe and passion of the community.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Pietro Annobil
reviewBody: Been there couple of time but i can tell without a shout of a doubt there is not better bachata event than BE. Hope all those amazing people get their sunday back because without BE doesnt feel sunday anymore
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Anne-Lise S
reviewTitle: Best bachata classes and social in London!
reviewBody: I am so grateful to have access to a space such as Bachata Exchange. I started learning bachata by coming to Bachata Exchange on Sundays and it quickly became the highlight of my week and one of the main reasons I love my new life in London. Such a great community, with open-minded, respectful and kind people. It's a great place to learn and practice bachata as well as discover amazing bachata teachers. Thank you for making this unique space possible - with the vibrant city of London in the backdrop, one can come to BE to connect with oneself and others through dance, so special!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Luis
reviewTitle: One of the best Bachata Social in London!
reviewBody: Good vibes, beginner friendly and many many good dancers ! Oh and it’s free!! One of the best bachata communities in London!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: LauraF0991
reviewBody: Bachata exchange is a fantastic community project where you can dance for free or for donation - accessible to absolutely everyone from all walks of life. It’s become one of my favourite places to dance in the uk with fantastic dancing every week. It’s a friendly space where you can turn up alone or work friends and have a fantastic time - there are few places you can do this in life these days and with no alcohol involved! I often come with friends from Bristol and tie a trip to BE in with other things in London. We all love it and make a special effort to stay for it. The level and vibe is great as semi outdoor dancing with a garden to chill in and access to the station for snacks etc. it’s perfect!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Marie T
reviewBody: Bachata exchange is the best outdoor dancing experience I've ever been at and my highlight of every week and every visit to London. The people and community are super friendly and respectful. Everybody is just enjoying the music and dance and it's also a great spot to make new friends and connections. There is such a great vibe which just makes happy.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: John
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange Is an example of what makes London so special: a place where the heart of business meets the soul of the people. Emerging from the dark days of the Covid epidemic, this community dance venture brings joy and society to a hugely diverse section of Londoners every week.Born of an inspired collaboration between the owners of Broadgate – the surrounding area of major shops and offices – and the expert dance teachers and DJs of London’s bachata scene, it is a place where everyone from absolute beginners to those with many years’ experience can gather in a totally safe and friendly space – with everyone welcome and no payment required.Many of those attending currently work in the surrounding area and come back on a Sunday afternoon to enjoy this other side of London’s financial hub, which has always been a sponsor of a vibrant arts scene. Others are foreign visitors and workers from every corner of the city who come to relax and recharge in this uniquely positive atmosphere.The one thing that everyone agrees on is that this is absolutely one of the best cultural experiences in London, a superb example of what can be achieved when the skill and determination of a grassroots organisation meets the goodwill and backing of enlightened businesses in the world's best city.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Savina C
reviewTitle: Bachata Exchange brings so much joy! Let’s keep it going!!
reviewBody: I attended Bachata Exchange almost every week since Day 1, and it’s what I look forward to all week! It has become my happy place.It's events like these that bring people together, creating lasting memories and strengthening our sense of community. Bachata Exchange is more than just a dance party, it's a celebration of culture, connection, and joy. It's a space where people from all walks of life can come together to share in the love of music and dance.I can't emphasize enough how important it is to keep this event alive. It provides a unique and invaluable experience that simply cannot be replicated in an indoor setting. Let's keep the music playing and the dancers moving!!! <3
name: Bachata Exchange

author: David B
reviewTitle: Bachata Exchange in London is fantastic!
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange in London is fantastic! Located near Liverpool Street station, it runs every Sunday. The live DJ and great atmosphere make it a must-visit. Highly recommended! Always a great time dancing Bachata here.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Jo C
reviewBody: BE has had a massive impact on my life. I usually find social gatherings daunting but BE is a perfect space for me to be comfortable around big groups and it also teaches me to dance! The open space is a big factor for me, it allows me to walk away, maybe grab a bite to eat in the local area, then come back after. The organisers are welcoming and I genuinely have never met such an organised and dedicated team running an event that's completely free. This is truly a unique space and I would recommend this to anyone looking to dance in a safe space.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Aiste
reviewTitle: THE place for Bachata dancing in London 💃🏼
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange holds a special place in my heart. That is where my bachata journey has started and I have been going to BE on Sundays for two years now (and counting!). The place has a wonderful community of social dancers, amazing teachers, a perfectly located venue, and just the best vibes! If you are not part of the community, I highly recommend joining to enhance your bachata experience and meet friends for life 💯
name: Bachata Exchange

author: lkm910
reviewBody: Very nice place to learn bachata and meet a large community of dancers, open to all levels. Thanks to the organiser for making it such a nice experience.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: summeraddict
reviewTitle: The place to be for London bachata
reviewBody: Great team of teachers, great atmosphere and friendly inclusive international vibe. Amazing venue, simply perfect for summer nights dancing bachata in London. Easy to get to, great floor, open air but guaranteed rain free! And you don’t need a partner.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Irmina W
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange is such a wonderful weekly event, very important to almost all bachata dancers in London. Many of them started dancing there and look forward to it every week.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Svetlana S
reviewBody: When I was going to London, I dreamed of dancing here. And now I'm finally in London, but.... Please! Help make my dream come true! I want to dance bachata in July
name: Bachata Exchange

author: federica g
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange is easily THE PALCE TO BE for bachata dancing in London. They offer free lessons that bring together dancers of all skill levels in a lively, welcoming community. People travel from different parts of the country and even from different countries just to attend this weekly event!!! The covered open-air venue is perfect for dancing, offering a refreshing and spacious environment. With great instructors, a fun atmosphere, and the pure joy of dancing, Bachata Exchange is a must-attend for any dance lover.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Anastasia
reviewBody: My favourite dancing place! The best bachata dancers, great music and organization, very convenient central location near Liverpool street, and amazing atmosphere!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Rahaf N
reviewBody: Attending BE has been nothing short of transformative for my mental health and overall well-being. Each event is a magical experience that leaves me feeling energised , invigorated, and ready to take on the week. The sense of community here is unparalleled—I've met incredible friends who uplift and inspire me. The atmosphere is vibrant and welcoming, making it the perfect place to connect, dance, and celebrate life. BE is not just a dance event; it's a sanctuary for the soul. Highly recommended!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Jacopo M
reviewTitle: Best Place to Dance in London
reviewBody: I go to BE every Sunday, and I absolutely love it. It has an amazing community of dancers which just love dancing outdoors in the open and connecting with fellow bachata appassionandos. Bachata Exchange on a Sunday makes my summers in London so special! I don’t know what I would do without it!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Gabi T
reviewTitle: Bachata Exchange is the best bachata social dancing event
reviewBody: Been going for the past two years, great environment for begginers, intermadietes and advanced. Amazing community. I love it that it's in open air and alcohol free ❤️
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Mark A
reviewBody: Couldn't recommend more! Amazing, friendly atmosphere and so welcoming. I've been going for years and has been amazing starting out and then getting more experienced. Great to dance with people of all levels! Music is spot on too and outdoor vibe is incredible
name: Bachata Exchange

author: ALEXANDRA K
reviewTitle: Amazing open air dancing night in London
reviewBody: I always have amazing time at Bachata Exchange! P with friends, enjoying bachata music and much more!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: GENIS I
reviewBody: Is the best social latin dancing in London, and the biggest!It's very friendly and the location and atmosphere is amazing.All free or donations which is always nice give since they do even lessons for free. Usually lessons at 5 pm on Sundays and then social until 11 pm?A must if you like bachata!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Diana W
reviewTitle: Dance bachata in an ideal location with good vibes only
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange is the perfect place to spread the love of dance. It’s open to all levels, with classes at the beginning and an incredible social to follow. Time flies when you’re there, it’s just magical. Not to mention the location is absolutely ideal: smooth floor for spins, covered to protect from the elements, easy to get to from most places. The organisers are friendly and dedicated — we can always count on them showing up, with a smile and a great playlist ♥️
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Language I
reviewTitle: Best place in London to dance Bachata!
reviewBody: Excelent event ! Very well organized , it's a pity that was cancelled. I hope it is allowed again asap!! Excellent environment to share with friends and family.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Michael Y
reviewTitle: Bring back bachata exchange - London needs it!
reviewBody: Absolutely the best social dancing place in London bar none! The atmosphere is amazing, friendly and welcoming but exciting at the same time. It is the best way to kill the Sunday blues comprehensively. I’m always sad when it is closed in the winter months. But now it’s closed in the middle of the summer as well due to permit issues, which is devastating. Please sort out a new permit as soon as possible - London is not the same without bachata exchange!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Roving18926679278
reviewBody: A wide outdoor covered place that fits a lot of people. Great lessons for complete beginners to experts. Ashley top teacher.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: S M
reviewBody: The loveliest place to dance, here I learned and practiced bachata from scratch. There’s free classes at the beginning, from 5 to 6, and then there’s the social till 11
name: Bachata Exchange

author: andrea15999
reviewBody: Bachata exchange is a beautiful community providing free dance classes and socials in an amazing outdoor venue. It has a great friendly atmosphere and gives people the opportunity to practice their hobby, meet others and improve their social skills.Nowadays with so much importance on mental health, Bachata exchange plays a fundamental part in improving peoples wellbeing. It helps them connect with others, spend time outdoors, strengthen social connections and stay active. Thank you Bachata exchange ! You make me look forward to every Sunday and you bring a lot of happiness into my life x
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Miriam C
reviewTitle: The best social dance in London!
reviewBody: Amazing place surrounded by good music and good friends, BE is one of the best social dances that I’ve ever been to! I love the energy and their vibes!!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Julia
reviewTitle: My Highlight of my Trip to London
reviewBody: Bachata exchange was definitely one of my highlights of my trip to London! Everyone was super friendly and welcoming and it is a great way to connect with the UK Bachata Community! It is really remarkable that such a big and high quality Bachata event is happening weekly in the heart of London! I have been travelling to many places but Bachata Exchange is really something unique!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Ashley M
reviewBody: I owe my whole career to Bachata Exchange. They were the first ones to see my talent and offer me a job I never thought was a possibility before. They help me discover my passion, teaching dance, and thanks to them my career keeps growing constantly. I volunteer my time teaching at Bachata Exchange every week and it’s my favourite thing to do.Bachata Exchange it’s an amazing FREE event for the community. BE brings people together to share one common passion, dance! No matter your age or where you are coming from, everyone is welcomed at BE. BE is a constant ray of sunshine in our forever cloudy English weather, it makes my Sundays way more enjoyable and I can’t wait for it to re-start
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Anika2294
reviewTitle: Best and friendly bachata event in London
reviewBody: This is my absolute favourite event in London. It's where I meet friends, de-stress, learn dance in a friendly and relaxed place. Overall I have such lovely evening on Sundays that I wouldn't miss it for the world. It's really enriching example of how beautifully multicultural London is! I wish there were more events like this.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Ilya Pichka
reviewBody: BE is a place to meet your dancing friends, dance, catch up and laugh. London bachata scene wouldn’t be the same without BE.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Christian G
reviewBody: Great place to learn and dance bachata is putting it lightly. It’s such a great place to go on a Sunday evening and dance bachata with other people who also love the dance. A great thanks to the organisers for putting their hearts into running this, and for the building managers for letting us use this space.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Guillermo A
reviewBody: It’s said that the best experiences you will have in life will be for free. That rule can be applied to BE which has been an incredible open doors social bachata experience where everyone has been welcomed. As all the great projects, this started as something small, and due to the enthusiasm and consistency from the personnel involved, has become in a huge lure from London and rest of the UK bachateros. The social impact from this barrier-less project is countless. From professional dancers willing to excel on their skills, to beginners that arrived the first day with the obvious shyness for approaching to the unknown. Everyone whom has come regularly to the exchange court, have experienced how this social project has became a must on the summer Sundays.Consciously or not, this social event had help to create bonds among people that would never sit down in the same table during their daily life routine. Definitely a priceless contribution. The reasons to continue with this project, obviously always complying with the regulations and permits required, are limitless. So let’s hope the best for the future of BE!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Dani T
reviewTitle: Sundays are my favorite day because of Bachata Exchange
reviewBody: Because of Bachata Exchange, Sunday is now my favorite day of the week! It’s truly a magical place to be. The environment is so welcoming, inclusive, supportive and friendly. The classes are free and the social is everything! I’ve danced with some amazing leads and have improved more just dancing at the socials than anything. This is a special place and 💯 worth all the hype. I hope the new license comes through!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Michael T
reviewTitle: Safe, sociable and some of the best dancers in the UK
reviewBody: Very safe and sociable. One of the few social activities that focus on something other than alcohol. Everyone is friendly and good spirited. One of the best places to dance in London
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Olivier B
reviewBody: Central London, huge floor, outdoor with a roof, professional bachata dj, free classes, super artists.. not a surprise Bachata exchange became super popular with hundreds of people attending every Sunday. Great vibes and suitable for everybody from complete beginner to super advance. If you like bachata there are many good places in london where you can dance, but none which can compete with bachata exchange.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Attila I
reviewTitle: YES, and CHEERS to BE (Bachata Exchange) !!! :)
reviewBody: I usually went for Bachata Exchange to dance... and dance... and dance! :) Then, I started to relax, dance and have chit-chats with all the lovely people around! Got to know them a little bit, introduced other people to the community, introduced other people to each other... I started networking! :) It is a fantastic place to meet new faces! To relax, or spend a few hours outdoors, in a welcoming circle of dancers and learners! BE is bringing people together! Lovely idea, lovely venue and awesome organisers and teachers! Thank you!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Alexei Coban
reviewTitle: Best place for Bachata in London
reviewBody: This is the best place to dance Bachata in London! I hope this will continue on and on cause it is just so good! Thank you so much to the organisers for keeping this going Much love ❤️
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Ali82360
reviewBody: Bachata exchange is a wonderful social and dance hub for its members. The vibe and energy of this establishment is beyond words. It's a unique and irreplaceable dance venue to learn and practice Bachata, dance with partners from different levels, make new connections and friends for life. Sunday evenings in London without BE is dull and boring! We all hope to see you back soon.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Amol W
reviewBody: One of the highlights of my week - teachers are super friendly, the community they foster has been brilliant! Enjoy every session they host.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: BenLondon22
reviewTitle: The best place in London for Bachata
reviewBody: The best place for bachata. Fresh air 😀, great community, the best Dj. For Sundays evening is the best place to be. I highly recommend Bachata Exchange!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Jake S
reviewBody: Such an integral part of the grass roots London Bachata dance scene allowing for a more accessible introduction to the lifestyle
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Kira L
reviewBody: This was the first party in the bachata dance community that I have ever attended. It was the first place I had made friends after the pandemic. It was a place I could go to for dancing when I was low on funds. And it had a lovely energy.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Emilia K
reviewBody: An absolutely amazing place to enjoy music, dancing and human connection - very lucky to get to be a part of a truly warmhearted and lovely community of dancers each time. Thank you for making each one of my Sunday evenings in London a pure joy!!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Rob L
reviewBody: All level Bachata classes and social event every Sunday @ Exchange Place in the heart of London. Totally free but donation is welcome. Unmissable!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Ben W
reviewBody: The most fun you can have on a Sunday night. Such a positive vibe and a great community, which is hard to find in London. Thanks BE!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Diego M
reviewTitle: Best Dance Party from London - nicest & friendliest people ever!
reviewBody: This is the best dancing class / party / event of London and one of the best I've participated anywhere in the world.Everyone is extremely polite, friendly supportive.This brings such a fantastic energy to recharge batteries Sundays and start the working week with the right foot.I've been going to this event since 2021 and its absolutely wonderful.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Neha H
reviewBody: BE has become my weekly routine. It’s the highlight of my week! The space is incredible, the organisers are amazing and ensures that people respect the space. It’s culturally significant event for the bachata community. So much fun, such a great environment.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Karuppiah CT
reviewBody: Bachata exchange is the best place to dance bachata in the UK. The event is located right in the heart of London, which makes it easy to get to. The covered open-air venue is perfect for dancing, offering a refreshing and spacious environment. This place welcomes you to be a part of the bachata dancing community in London. The community here is so welcoming, so friendly, and so diverse {I've met, danced and become friends with people from all over the world here}. The event here offers so much yet it is totally free of charge. Which event does that? Isn't that amazing? Dancing bachata has in many ways given meaning to life. It keeps you physically active, and improves mental health { I am the happiest when dancing bachata}, and you get to meet so many people and make friends, and eventually become part of a community. This place is unique, truly special and offers the best vibes! I highly recommend joining to enhance your bachata experience
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Byron F
reviewBody: I love this place, the people, the music, the dancing, the connection. The people who run it are awesome, they really care about making a welcoming and wholesome community and doing it just for the love.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Juan Ignacio Cadiz-Miranda
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange (BE) is hands-down the best and largest bachata event in town. No other social comes close to the level BE is at and the best of all is that is free of charge. BE has grown significantly the bachata community in London by offering free lessons to newcomers and a 100% bachata social - no animations, no shows and no bullsh*t; just social dancing. A myriad of people travel on weekly basis from Birmingham, Brighton, Bristol, and many other places outside London to attend this event, whilst the dedicated and hard-working BE team goes all out to give them the best experience possible.BE is genuinely unique and magic, and would a shame to lose something so special.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Rash E
reviewTitle: Best free Latin dance (bachata) in London.
reviewBody: A very nice event every Sunday that is totally free and full of good vibes and good people.Free bachata class from 5pm till 6pm them social dance till 11pm.No alcohol and no smoking so all are welcome. I have been going for a long time now and I highly recommend it to anybody who would like to experience a Latin dance 💃 Bachata taking over! Nuff love to all the Orginisers. 10/10
name: Bachata Exchange

author: John W
reviewBody: Best public place to have free bachata classes and lessons on Sundays in London!The socials there are amazing along with the people who help organise the event :)
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Izabela S
reviewBody: One of the best places to feel safe and comfortable to learn bachata. The community is absolutely amazing. Miss it soo much.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Louenn C
reviewBody: Absolutely absolutely amazing! BE is my Sunday ritual, and I wouldn't miss it for the world. The classes are brilliant, with amazing teachers, the community is welcoming and kind. It's my happy place for the end of the week! I hope we can continue to all dance together and enjoy this beautiful community that now gathers so many wonderful people!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Charlie M
reviewTitle: Amazing dance event, the best in Europe
reviewBody: This is my community in London. It was hard to make friends after I moved home. I lived abroad for 10 years and most of my school friends had moved on. But I found a community and new friends at BE every Sunday. Amazing event, I go almost every week, and without it I wouldn't be as healthy, both physically and mentally. Can't overstate how important this event is for so many of us.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Joanna B
reviewBody: At the beginning I'd like to thank BE Team for creating & maintaining this event to be safe and welcoming to everyone as well as Broadgate for letting BE community using their space without extra costs, which allows us coming without worrying of extra expenses.BE event is great for everyone. BE Team ensures we are safe and the rules are retained.BE makes us happy, allows to keep fit, makes friends, supports wellbeing physically and mentally.It's a fantastic way to distress, to make a day brighter, to watch other dancers and learn, to spend time quality, to keep fit.Sometimes someone forgets their stuff, then BE community makes sure we find the owner with 99% success.Recently, the community has supported the purchase of new speakers due to worn old ones. Too long great music. HeheheWe love BE for making us united. We want BE running there!THANKS to Everyone!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Andrei P
reviewTitle: One of the best social in London
reviewBody: All the time when I coming here I have great time catching up with friends, meet new peoples also the dance experience is amazing you can meet lot of high level dancers, teachers, performers or artists
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Mark J
reviewBody: Easily the best Latin dance event in London. Typically have 300 dancers, everything is completely free including the hour long class at the beginning. Suitable for complete beginners, I know lots of people who have been dancing over a year now whos first ever lessons were here. But also great for experienced dancers as the best dancers in London are here every week.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Maddi A
reviewTitle: The best place to dance bachata in London
reviewBody: This is by far the best bachata event in London. It's open air, free and there are so many amazing and friendly dancers! My favourite place to go on Sundays, and I hope it stays for a long time :)
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Tan S
reviewTitle: Bachata Exchange: Where Music and Souls Embrace
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange isn't just a dance event; it's a sanctuary for the soul. It's a place where inhibitions melt away, replaced by the pure joy of movement and connection. Here, age and skill level become afterthoughts, overshadowed by the infectious rhythm of bachata.Without BE, I wouldn't have discovered the magic of dance. It's opened a door to a world of shared passion and connection, something I never knew I craved. This vibrant space welcomes everyone, fostering a supportive and judgement-free environment.*The tireless efforts of the BE team deserve a standing ovation. Their dedication ensures a weekly dose of pure joy for countless Londoners, not to mention those who travel from afar to grace the dance floor with their presence.Bachata Exchange isn't just about steps; it's about celebrating life's rhythm. It's a testament to the power of music and movement to bring people together. Here's to many more Sundays filled with laughter, connection, and the intoxicating magic of bachata.This sanctuary thrives thanks to the generosity of Broadgate. To them, we express our deepest gratitude. May BE continue to be a beacon of joy, a space where hearts beat as one in the vibrant rhythm of bachata. We, the Bachata Exchange community, not only cherish this space but believe it adds value to Broadgate's vision. We urge their continued support in keeping this magic alive for all to enjoy.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Edon A
reviewTitle: Unmissable event where new friends are made!
reviewBody: Bachata Exchange has become an unmissable event in the London dance scene. Not only is the event itself amazing, it's a place where you can meet new and old friends. As someone who's new to the city, this is a perfect place to come and meet and make new friends while also learning a fun skill which you can take with you anywhere in the world.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Companion594498
reviewTitle: Enjoy it while exercising mind and body
reviewBody: I love these events, with fun athmosphere, very respectuful and professionals attending these events, socialising is what people need ! Thanks
name: Bachata Exchange

author: ioanna Z
reviewBody: its always so fun being in exchange. Safe environment and always great dances. Highly recommended for everyone that love bachata
name: Bachata Exchange

author: iona
reviewTitle: A pillar of our community and the highlight of our weeks.
reviewBody: Without a doubt, Sundays have become my favourite day of the week thanks to Bachata Exchange. I started travelling to London every other week from Brighton just for BE, then it became every week… and then it seemed simpler to move here! I finally live close by and my heart breaks at the thought of BE being permanently cancelled 💔 The magic isn’t just about the dance. Yes, bachata a fantastic dance and here you can dance in a beautiful space (with a great floor, under cover, and close to shops and the station) with people of all different levels for FREE for five hours *that go by in a flash* six if you include the free lesson beforehand too! But the community is the special sauce. I’ve met people from so many different backgrounds of so many different ages that I would never have met without bachata and specifically BE. Unlike other inside and very loud dance venues, at exchange house you can actually hear people you are chatting to, walk to the nice seating area at the back of the venue, and some of us have had picnics on the grass here in the summer before the social!The fact that it’s free and accessible means almost the whole bachata community in London turn up for a Sunday night dance (including all of the top level dancers) and because of this, we have dancers visit from all over the world. Every time I meet another dancer at a festival or abroad, and they want to visit the UK, I say they have to make sure to stay on Sunday just so they can come to BE - the best Bachata night of the week ♥️ I can’t express how grateful I am that Bachata Exchange has existed, facilitated, and fostered such a wonderful community. It’s a big part of me feeling at home here in London. Thank you from the bottom of my heart.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Shubham G
reviewTitle: Free bachata festival every Sunday in the heart of London
reviewBody: I highly highly recommend this place if you wanna visit London and you know how to dance bachata. Even if you don't know, it's not an issue, you can attend their free classes.It's like a festival every Sunday. To be honest, it is way better than majority of socials/festivals globally.It's easier to access (next to liverpool street station).I know a lot of people discover bachata by accident. Sometimes, by ending up in wrong pub or seeing someone dancing in park and with time, they feel thankful that they discovered it and pursued it.BE makes it a lot of people to pursue this hobby affordable for a lot of people.Since London is a global city and if you experience that BE is the place to be, I have met people I didn't exist, with time I have become friends with many of them and I am thankful to BE for providing this community, a circle of friends with whom you can dance every Sunday and start the next week with a smile.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Abigail E
reviewBody: This is basically a free open-air bachata festival happening every week. People are kind and friendly, music is the best and the atmosphere is phenomenal. It charges me up for the whole week. Heaven on earth.
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Alexei Coban
reviewTitle: If you want to dance Bachata, this is the place to BE!
reviewBody: The place to BE for Bachata dancing in London. At the moment of writing it's on every Sunday at 5pm with free class for 3-4 levels from very beginners to more advanced and from 6pm it is for free social dancing. This should be the correct postcode Primrose Street EC2A 2HT LONDON. It's 5 minutes walk from the Liverpool Street station. There's an Instagram page Bachata_Exchange. This is my favourite event for dancing Bachata in London. The floor, the cover, the fresh air and the incredible amount of people, probably about 150-200 each Sunday, just make it amazing! Definitely a must for a dance lover in London!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Lindsay S
reviewBody: This community is amazing. I’ve been a part of salsa and bachata communities around the world and this is one of the best. Really high quality teachers, mix of levels, and great atmosphere. So many would be sad if BE had to go away. Love it!
name: Bachata Exchange

author: Sherpa53367979228
reviewBody: Fantastic people, energy, classes and the vibe. It felt like a festival everytime I was there. The event gave me loads of confidence as a social dancer! <3
name: Bachata Exchange
